task.summary: Realized second sub-task of Optional Task 4 in the MatrixLongestSequence class. Methods printMatrix(int[][] matrix) and printLine(int[] line) removed to separate PrintMatrix class in special util package. JUnit4 Tests for task1, task2 and first sub-task of task4 realized. Code refactored: numbers in conditions passed as named final values.
